alert.note: Alert for Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 12 at 9:32PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwestern Suffolk County in southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 932 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms capable of causing minor poor drainage flooding in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that could experience minor flooding include... Islip, Ronkonkoma, Bay Shore, Sayville, Captree State Park, Central Islip, East Islip, Bohemia, Oakdale, Islip Terrace, Brightwaters, Ocean Beach and Saltaire. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
